title: 025: Pikachu
author: Chris Taylor
description:
Finally!!The episode you’ve all been waiting for – the electrifying Pikachu, warming our hearts with the power of exactly 18.5 Hiroshimas. But does he have the leadership skills necessary to save us from the Butterfree plight?  

Hosts: [Chris](https://twitter.com/DaLiquidSword), [Aleksandar](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC56emXYp1pHXL2E9SLcYisw), [Ethan](https://twitter.com/SynSpawn), [Mark](https://www.twitch.tv/robobobatron), [Joe](https://twitter.com/Prnkt92)

For more episodes and the full ranking list visit [Magmar Sucks](http://www.magmarsucks.com) on the web.

For more on the Pokemon in this episode check out their [Bulbapedia page](http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Pikachu_(Pok%C3%A9mon))
